title: Pieter Stemmet
text:
Pieter Franz Stemmet (born 18 February 1992) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing with <a href="Romania">Romania</a>n <a href="SuperLiga%20%28rugby%29">SuperLiga</a> side <a href="Timi%C8%99oara%20Saracens">Timișoara Saracens</a>. His regular position is prop.
Career.
Youth.
He represented at the 2005 Under-13 Craven Week tournament and the 2008 Under-16 Grant Khomo Week, which led to his inclusion in the Under-16 Elite Squad in the same year. He played in the 2009 Under-18 Academy Week tournament and in an S.A. Academy side in the Under-18 <a href="Craven%20Week">Craven Week</a> tournament in the same year.
He joined the in 2011 and represented them in the <a href="2011%20Under-19%20Provincial%20Championship">2011 Under-19 Provincial Championship</a>. He was also named in the senior <a href="Vodacom%20Cup">Vodacom Cup</a> squad, but didn't make an appearance.
Western Province.
He returned to in 2012 and was included in their squad for the <a href="2012%20Vodacom%20Cup">2012 Vodacom Cup</a> competition. He made his debut in the opening game of the season, a 51–22 victory over . He came on as a substitute just after half-time and scored a debut try at the end of the game in his only appearance for Western Province.
Eastern Province Kings.
After playing for the in the <a href="2012%20Under-21%20Provincial%20Championship">2012 Under-21 Provincial Championship</a>, he then joined the and was included in their squad for the <a href="2013%20Currie%20Cup%20First%20Division">2013 Currie Cup First Division</a> season.
He made his debut for the – as well as his <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> debut – in the 37–21 victory over the on 6 July 2013 in <a href="Welkom">Welkom</a>.
Pumas.
On 3 June 2014, the Eastern Province Rugby Union announced that Stemmet would join <a href="Nelspruit">Nelspruit</a>-based side the on a loan deal for the <a href="2014%20Currie%20Cup%20Premier%20Division">2014 Currie Cup Premier Division</a>. However, he failed to make an appearance for the Pumas.
